title: 124 How a Distance Runner Turned a Shoe Company Into a Billion-Dollar Brand with Angel Martinez
description:
"If you don't understand what it takes to live a life with some integrity, you're not going to be successful in business." - Angel Martinez
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/124.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
